thread.title: Legal & General pledges further investments in UK renewables
thread.title_full: Legal & General pledges further investments in UK renewables

title: Legal & General pledges further investments in UK renewables
text:
End date Legal & General pledges further investments in UK renewables 
Insurance company Legal & General (L&G) plans to increase its UK investments in renewable energy, despite recently announced changes to national support mechanisms, said CEO Nigel Wilson. To access this article please sign-in below or register for a free one-month trial. Login
